name: Abyss of Empires:The Mythology
summary:
You can build and rule over your own land, explore the unknown lands and fight for survival. With a huge number of maps to play on and the ability to choose different civilizations, you can have an endless number of strategy choices.

In the game, you will be able to recruit Heroes and Command them. Heroes will have various abilities and skills. They will be your main weapon in the war against enemies. In addition, you can recruit units and use them for battle.
